external_games.name: Train Simulator: LMS Coronation Class "Duchess of Hamilton" Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: LMS Coronation Class "Duchess of Hamilton" Loco
summary: Once a record-breaking steam locomotive admired by many on the UK's rail network, the LMS Coronation Class 'Duchess of Hamilton' comes to Train Simulator 2021 in its striking streamlined variant. The LMS Coronation Class was a mainline steam locomotive designed by William Stanier and built at Crewe Works between 1937 and 1948.
